substitutions.name: PropertyDefinition
substitutions.pattern:
| IdentifierReference<guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt1
    | CoverInitializedName<guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt2
    | PropertyName<guardYield, guardAwait> ":" AssignmentExpression<withIn, guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt3
    | MethodDefinition<guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt4
    | "..." AssignmentExpression<withIn, guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt5
substitutions.replacement:
| "..." AssignmentExpression<withIn, guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt5
    | MethodDefinition<guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt4
    | PropertyName<guardYield, guardAwait> ":" AssignmentExpression<withIn, guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt3
    | IdentifierReference<guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt1
    | CoverInitializedName<guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt2

substitutions._comment_: Need this rather than `#sc` so that EmptyStatement is not nullable.
substitutions.name: EmptyStatement

substitutions._comment_: ArrowFunction must come before ConditionalExpression, because the arrow function parameters will parse as a parenthesized expression. Both LeftHandSideExpression alternatives must also come before ConditionalExpression.
substitutions.name: AssignmentExpression
substitutions.pattern:
| ConditionalExpression<guardIn, guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt1
    | guardYield YieldExpression<guardIn, guardAwait> -- alt2
    | ArrowFunction<guardIn, guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt3
    | AsyncArrowFunction<guardIn, guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt4
    | LeftHandSideExpression<guardYield, guardAwait> "=" AssignmentExpression<guardIn, guardYield, guardAwait>  -- alt5
    | LeftHandSideExpression<guardYield, guardAwait> AssignmentOperator AssignmentExpression<guardIn, guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt6
substitutions.replacement:
| AsyncArrowFunction<guardIn, guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt4
    | ArrowFunction<guardIn, guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt3
    | LeftHandSideExpression<guardYield, guardAwait> "=" AssignmentExpression<guardIn, guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt5
    | LeftHandSideExpression<guardYield, guardAwait> AssignmentOperator AssignmentExpression<guardIn, guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt6
    | ConditionalExpression<guardIn, guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt1
    | guardYield YieldExpression<guardIn, guardAwait> -- alt2

substitutions.name: FormalParameters
substitutions.pattern:
| /* empty */ -- alt1
    | FunctionRestParameter<guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt2
    | FormalParameterList<guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt3
    | FormalParameterList<guardYield, guardAwait> "," -- alt4
    | FormalParameterList<guardYield, guardAwait> "," FunctionRestParameter<guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt5
substitutions.replacement:
| FunctionRestParameter<guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt2
    | FormalParameterList<guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt3
    | FormalParameterList<guardYield, guardAwait> "," -- alt4
    | FormalParameterList<guardYield, guardAwait> "," FunctionRestParameter<guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt5
    | /* empty */ -- alt1

substitutions._comment_: The recursive MemberExpression application must come before PrimaryExpression.
substitutions.name: MemberExpression
substitutions.pattern:
| PrimaryExpression<guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt1
    | SuperProperty<guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt5
    | MetaProperty -- alt6
    | new MemberExpression<guardYield, guardAwait> Arguments<guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt7
substitutions.replacement:
| new MemberExpression<guardYield, guardAwait> Arguments<guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt7
    | PrimaryExpression<guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt1
    | SuperProperty<guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt5
    | MetaProperty -- alt6

substitutions._comment_: Move PostfixExpression to the very end.
substitutions.name: UnaryExpression

substitutions._comment_: Move LeftHandSideExpression to the very end.
substitutions.name: UpdateExpression

substitutions._comment_: The first alternative is a subset of the second one, so flip the order.
substitutions.name: ConditionalExpression
substitutions.pattern:
| ShortCircuitExpression<guardIn, guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt1
    | ShortCircuitExpression<guardIn, guardYield, guardAwait> "?" AssignmentExpression<withIn, guardYield, guardAwait> ":" AssignmentExpression<guardIn, guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt2
substitutions.replacement:
| ShortCircuitExpression<guardIn, guardYield, guardAwait> "?" AssignmentExpression<withIn, guardYield, guardAwait> ":" AssignmentExpression<guardIn, guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt2
    | ShortCircuitExpression<guardIn, guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt1

substitutions._comment_: First, put move the left recursive application above the ShiftExpression. (It's not properly recognized as left recursive due to the `guardIn`. Then, move the `guardIn` to be right before the `"in"` terminal.
substitutions.name: RelationalExpression
substitutions.pattern:
| ShiftExpression<guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt1
    | guardIn RelationalExpression<withIn, guardYield, guardAwait> in ShiftExpression<guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt7
substitutions.replacement:
| RelationalExpression<withIn, guardYield, guardAwait> guardIn in ShiftExpression<guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt7
    | ShiftExpression<guardYield, guardAwait> -- alt1

substitutions._comment_: FIXME: Make sure these produce something useful.
substitutions.name: identifierPart

substitutions._comment_: Move decimalLiteral to the very end.
substitutions.name: numericLiteral

substitutions._comment_: alt1 is strictly a subset of the following two alternatives, so put it at the end.
substitutions.name: PostfixExpression
substitutions.pattern:
| LeftHandSideExpression<guardYield> -- alt1
    | LeftHandSideExpression<guardYield> ~lineTerminator "++" -- alt2
    | LeftHandSideExpression<guardYield> ~lineTerminator "--" -- alt3
substitutions.replacement:
| LeftHandSideExpression<guardYield> ~lineTerminator "++" -- alt2
    | LeftHandSideExpression<guardYield> ~lineTerminator "--" -- alt3
    | LeftHandSideExpression<guardYield> -- alt1

substitutions.name: StatementList
substitutions.pattern:
| StatementList<guardYield, guardReturn> StatementListItem<guardYield, guardReturn> -- alt2
    | StatementListItem<guardYield, guardReturn> -- alt1

substitutions.name: StatementList
substitutions.pattern:
| StatementList<guardYield, guardAwait, guardReturn> StatementListItem<guardYield, guardAwait, guardReturn> -- alt2
    | StatementListItem<guardYield, guardAwait, guardReturn> -- alt1
